response.original_title: Die Sendung mit der Maus, Natur pur mit der Maus!
response.overview: It is orange, atemporal and, when he explains stories about the World, captivates all Children. The distinctive Mouse, also snoopy and pretty clever... Together with its Friends, gives the Mouse its best laughs.
response.tagline: It is orange, atemporal and, when he explains stories about the World, captivates all Children. The distinctive Mouse, also snoopy and pretty clever... Together with its Friends, gives the Mouse its best laughs.
response.title: Die Sendung mit der Maus, Natur pur mit der Maus!
